resources.string: Manage storage related settings, like backups, cache and downloads
Change Kaizoyu! related settings, like appearance or quality of life functionalities
Send anonymous usage and performance reports to help improve the app
Include IPv6 download sources. This will display IPv6 sources, but won\'t make them your default
Check for updates automatically and notify when a new update is found
Erase the stored cache files manually
Force day theme, regardless of system defaults
Force night theme, regardless of system defaults
The video cache has been cleared
The search history has been cleared
Add played shows to your `Currently Watching` list if they aren\'t present in any list
Move played shows from any list to your `Currently Watching` list. If the show is not present in any list, it has no effect
Display English anime titles whenever available
Check for app updates. Current version: %s
See the licenses, copyright and attributions of the libraries used to make Kaizoyu! possible
Night mode only, baby. A theme for dark mode lovers, especially tuned for AMOLED screens.
Brings your own custom color palette to the app. If you haven\'t defined one, the default color palette for your Android version will be used.
Smooth color changes, easy to follow, easy on your eyes.
Shows advanced search icon in the home search bar
When enabled, most of the download process MUST be encrypted. May cause handshake failure
Share current session of logs with another app. Be aware, logs could contain personal data, like your IP
No logs to share so far, please do some action first
Welcome to developer mode, fellow weeb
Run a one-shot worker of your choosing immediately. Useful for debugging issues related to notifications
When enabled, XDCC will be used instead of DCC; this may result in faster downloads. May cause complete download failure
